fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Royalty: Your role is revealed at the beginning of the game as simply "King". Any attempt to check your role, even your true role, will show up as "King" as well. You will appear to win with Order.
- Wealthy: You start with 6 HP and 6 cards. Your hand limit is 6. 
- Paranoia: You only have 2 channels. You cannot participate in Duels. 
- Traitor: You have access to the Chaos chat. You will replace the Overlord if you exist. You will appear to win with your Chaos teammates. **You will have extra uses of some abilities the Order King normally has.**

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Guards: Block! an attack. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Doctors: Heal! 1 HP. Cleanse! an effect off of you of your choice. [3 uses, 2 CD] 
- Restrain: Prevent a player from using cards in the next phase. [1 use, Unique] 
- Retreat: Go to the Kingâ€™s Quarters OR Underground Lair this Night phase. [1 use, Unique]
